00001 #include "dsCMatrix.h"
00002 
00003 static int chk_nm(const char *nm, int perm, int LDL, int super)
00004 {
00005     if (strlen(nm) != 11) return 0;
00006     if (strcmp(nm + 3, "Cholesky")) return 0;
00007     if (super > 0 && nm[0] != 'S') return 0;
00008     if (super == 0 && nm[0] != 's') return 0;
00009     if (perm > 0 && nm[1] != 'P') return 0;
00010     if (perm == 0 && nm[1] != 'p') return 0;
00011     if (LDL > 0 && nm[2] != 'D') return 0;
00012     if (LDL == 0 && nm[2] != 'd') return 0;
00013     return 1;
00014 }
00015 
00033 static CHM_FR
00034 internal_chm_factor(SEXP Ap, int perm, int LDL, int super, double Imult)
00035 {
00036     SEXP facs = GET_SLOT(Ap, Matrix_factorSym);
00037     SEXP nms = getAttrib(facs, R_NamesSymbol);
00038     int sup, ll;
00039     CHM_FR L;
00040     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP__(Ap);
00041     R_CheckStack();
00042 
00043     if (LENGTH(facs)) {
00044         for (int i = 0; i < LENGTH(nms); i++) { /* look for a match in cache */
00045             if (chk_nm(CHAR(STRING_ELT(nms, i)), perm, LDL, super)) {
00046                 L = AS_CHM_FR(VECTOR_ELT(facs, i));
00047                 R_CheckStack();
00048                 /* copy the factor so later it can safely be cholmod_free'd */
00049                 L = cholmod_copy_factor(L, &c);
00050                 if (Imult) cholmod_factorize_p(A, &Imult, (int*)NULL, 0, L, &c);
00051                 return L;
00052             }
00053         }
00054     }
00055                                 /* No cached factor - create one */
00056     sup = c.supernodal;         /* save current settings */
00057     ll = c.final_ll;
00058 
00059     c.final_ll = (LDL == 0) ? 1 : 0;
00060     c.supernodal = (super > 0) ? CHOLMOD_SUPERNODAL : CHOLMOD_SIMPLICIAL;
00061 
00062     if (perm) {                 /* obtain fill-reducing permutation */
00063         L = cholmod_analyze(A, &c);
00064     } else {                    /* require identity permutation */
00065         /* save current settings */
00066         int nmethods = c.nmethods, ord0 = c.method[0].ordering,
00067             postorder = c.postorder;
00068         c.nmethods = 1; c.method[0].ordering = CHOLMOD_NATURAL; c.postorder = FALSE;
00069         L = cholmod_analyze(A, &c);
00070         /* and now restore */
00071         c.nmethods = nmethods; c.method[0].ordering = ord0; c.postorder = postorder;
00072     }
00073     if (!cholmod_factorize_p(A, &Imult, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00074         error(_("Cholesky factorization failed"));
00075     c.supernodal = sup;         /* restore previous settings */
00076     c.final_ll = ll;
00077 
00078     if (!Imult) {               /* cache the factor */
00079         char fnm[12] = "sPDCholesky";
00080         if (super > 0) fnm[0] = 'S';
00081         if (perm == 0) fnm[1] = 'p';
00082         if (LDL == 0) fnm[2] = 'd';
00083         set_factors(Ap, chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 0), fnm);
00084     }
00085     return L;
00086 }
00087 
00088 SEXP dsCMatrix_chol(SEXP x, SEXP pivot)
00089 {
00090     int pivP = asLogical(pivot);
00091     CHM_FR L = internal_chm_factor(x, pivP, 0, 0, 0.);
00092     CHM_SP R, Rt;
00093     SEXP ans;
00094 
00095     Rt = cholmod_factor_to_sparse(L, &c);
00096     R = cholmod_transpose(Rt, /*values*/ 1, &c);
00097     cholmod_free_sparse(&Rt, &c);
00098     ans = PROTECT(chm_sparse_to_SEXP(R, 1/*do_free*/, 1/*uploT*/, 0/*Rkind*/,
00099                                      "N"/*diag*/, GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym)));
00100 
00101     if (pivP) {
00102         SEXP piv = PROTECT(allocVector(INTSXP, L->n));
00103         int *dest = INTEGER(piv), *src = (int*)L->Perm;
00104 
00105         for (int i = 0; i < L->n; i++) dest[i] = src[i] + 1;
00106         setAttrib(ans, install("pivot"), piv);
00107         setAttrib(ans, install("rank"), ScalarInteger((size_t) L->minor));
00108         UNPROTECT(1);
00109     }
00110     cholmod_free_factor(&L, &c);
00111     UNPROTECT(1);
00112     return ans;
00113 }
00114 
00115 SEXP dsCMatrix_Cholesky(SEXP Ap, SEXP perm, SEXP LDL, SEXP super, SEXP Imult)
00116 {
00117     int c_pr = c.print;
00118     c.print = 0;/* stop CHOLMOD printing; we cannot suppress it (in R), and
00119                    have error handler already */
00120     SEXP r = chm_factor_to_SEXP(internal_chm_factor(Ap, asLogical(perm),
00121                                                     asLogical(LDL),
00122                                                     asLogical(super),
00123                                                     asReal(Imult)),
00124                                 1 /* dofree */);
00125     c.print = c_pr;
00126     return r;
00127 }
00128 
00142 SEXP dsCMatrix_LDL_D(SEXP Ap, SEXP permP, SEXP resultKind)
00143 {
00144     CHM_FR L;
00145     SEXP ans;
00146     int c_pr = c.print;
00147     c.print = 0;/* stop CHOLMOD printing; we cannot suppress it (in R), and
00148                    have error handler already */
00149     L = internal_chm_factor(Ap, asLogical(permP),
00150                             /*LDL*/ 1, /*super*/0, /*Imult*/0.);
00151     c.print = c_pr;
00152     ans = PROTECT(diag_tC_ptr(L->n,
00153                               L->p,
00154                               L->x,
00155                               L->Perm,
00156                               resultKind));
00157     cholmod_free_factor(&L, &c);
00158     UNPROTECT(1);
00159     return(ans);
00160 }
00161 
00162 SEXP dsCMatrix_Csparse_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00163 {
00164     CHM_FR L = internal_chm_factor(a, -1, -1, -1, 0.);
00165     CHM_SP cx, cb = AS_CHM_SP(b);
00166     R_CheckStack();
00167 
00168     cx = cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_A, L, cb, &c);
00169     cholmod_free_factor(&L, &c);
00170     return chm_sparse_to_SEXP(cx, /*do_free*/ 1, /*uploT*/ 0,
00171                               /*Rkind*/ 0, /*diag*/ "N",
00172                               /*dimnames = */ R_NilValue);
00173 }
00174 
00175 SEXP dsCMatrix_matrix_solve(SEXP a, SEXP b)
00176 {
00177     CHM_FR L = internal_chm_factor(a, -1, -1, -1, 0.);
00178     CHM_DN cx, cb = AS_CHM_DN(PROTECT(mMatrix_as_dgeMatrix(b)));
00179     R_CheckStack();
00180 
00181     cx = cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_A, L, cb, &c);
00182     cholmod_free_factor(&L, &c);
00183     UNPROTECT(1);
00184     return chm_dense_to_SEXP(cx, 1, 0, /*dimnames = */ R_NilValue);
00185 }
00186 
00187 /* Needed for printing dsCMatrix objects */
00188 /* FIXME: Create a more general version of this operation: also for lsC, (dsR?),..
00189 *         e.g. make  compressed_to_dgTMatrix() in ./dgCMatrix.c work for dsC */
00190 SEXP dsCMatrix_to_dgTMatrix(SEXP x)
00191 {
00192     CHM_SP A = AS_CHM_SP__(x);
00193     CHM_SP Afull = cholmod_copy(A, /*stype*/ 0, /*mode*/ 1, &c);
00194     CHM_TR At = cholmod_sparse_to_triplet(Afull, &c);
00195     R_CheckStack();
00196 
00197     if (!A->stype)
00198         error("Non-symmetric matrix passed to dsCMatrix_to_dgTMatrix");
00199     cholmod_free_sparse(&Afull, &c);
00200     return chm_triplet_to_SEXP(At, 1, /*uploT*/ 0, /*Rkind*/ 0, "",
00201                                GET_SLOT(x, Matrix_DimNamesSym));
00202 }
